description: Chance Caldwell's got to be punished for dereliction of duties; failing to make Jake Andrews' dinner on time has made the big cheese angry. And Jake knows exactly how to treat his undisciplined underling. He chains the naked chef by his wrists, leaving his entire body vulnerable to whatever punishment his twisted thinking can conjure up. But that's no problem; the possibilities are endless and the sadistic Jake mercilessly terrorizes his prisoner both physically as well as fucking with his psyche. This tough love is not for sissies.
series: The Abduction Series, Part II - The Conflict
title: The Abduction Series, Part II - The Conflict
